loans.use: To ask for a loan to build a new house for her family in order to improve their standard of living.

loans.name: Edmund Haran's Ileje Group

texts.en:
Edmund H., age 46, is married with three children (ages 13, 8, and 3). He has a general shop which he started in 2007. He works from 7am to 9pm daily and is able to make a monthly profit of around US$ 189.

He hopes to take a loan with Tujijenge Tanzania to increase his capital. He will share this loan with his loan group which totals 15 members. These members will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

In the picture Edmund H. is 3rd from the right.

loans.use: to increase capital for their businesses

loans.name: Hai

texts.en:
Mrs. Hai R. is a grocer in Kraing Sromor Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. She is 53 and a widow with three children, two of whom are construction workers while the other attends school.

Mrs. Hai R. is building a new house for herself and her family. The house is nearly completed but Mrs. Hai R. does not have enough money to finish paying the house builders and so has decided to request a loan to pay for the rest of the building expenses.

loans.use: To pay for the building work and renovations made to her house

loans.name: Ren

texts.en:
Mrs. Ren S. is a rice farmer from Kraing Sromor Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. The revenue from her rice business is too little for her family because the farm she runs is a small one.

Therefore, Mrs. Ren S. is requesting a loan to help expand her rice field. Her husband, Mr. Yong Len, is a construction worker. Mrs. Ren S. is 27 and the mother of a child who is too young to work or study.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land to cultivate rice to expand her revenue.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Mrs. Sokha M. is 28 and the mother of three children, one of whom is attending school while the others are too young to work or study. She is a farmer in Kraing Sromor Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Since the price of land is going up, Mrs. Sokha M. has decided to buy a piece of land to re-sell later at a better price.

Unfortunately, Mrs. Sokha M. does not have enough money to buy it, therefore, she is requesting a loan for this purpose. Her husband, Mr. Tong Tim, is a motorbike-taxi driver. Previously, Mrs. Sokha M. obtained a loan from AMK to buy a motorbike for her husband’s business, a loan which she has paid back.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land to re-sell later at a better price.

loans.name: Sambath

texts.en: Mr. Sambath H. is a Khmer noodle maker in Stoeng Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. His wife, Mrs. Chanthy Vaoek, is employed in a garment factory and she also helps her husband when she has free time. They do not have any children. Mr. Sambath H. adn his wife now want to live separately from their parents. Thus he is requestinga loan to buy timber with which to build his new house.

loans.use: To buy timber to build a new house for him and his wife to live separately from their parents.

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru:
Mahfirat R. lives in the Gissar district. She is 44 years old and has two school-age children. Mahfirat is divorced, and raises and supports her children by herself. She has a university degree in teaching, and she currently teaches Tajik language in a local school. Since her salary is so small, and isn't even enough to by groceries, she also sells fruits and vegetables. She is currently on vacation and would like to expand the range of produce she offers. The more fresh goods she has, the more business she will have. Doing that, however, will require money, so she decided to take out a loan. She will pay back the loan over ten months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Рабиева Махфират Джобировна жительница района Гиссар. Возраст 44 года , имеет 2 детей школьников.Махфират разведенна .Содержит и воспитывает своих детей сама. Образование высшее, по специальности учительница.Махфират препадает в местной школе таджикский язык.Но так как заработная плата очень маленькая и не хватает даже на продукту питания ,клиентка занимается куплей продажей овощей и фруктов. В данное время она находится в отпуске и хочет увеличть ассортимент своего товара.Чем будет больше свежего товара ,тем лучше будет у ней торговля.Но для этого ей нужны деньги и она решила взять кредит.Планирует Махфират погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: Expanding product variety

loans.name: Sophim

texts.en: Mrs. Sophim O. is a pot-maker in Andoung Russey Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Her husband, Mr. Nget Phai, sells firewood. They have two children who are too young to work or attend school. Since Mrs. Sophim O.’s business is doing well, she would like to expand it by selling pots from door-to-door. Thus, Mrs. Sophim O.  has decided to request a loan to buy a cart so she can transport her products to sell. Previously, Mrs. Sophim O. obtained a loan from AMK to buy cows and she has fully paid off the loan. Her husband is shown in the picture on the right.

loans.use: To buy a cart so that she can transport her pots to sell door-to-door.

loans.name: Rima

texts.ru:
Rima K. lives in the Gissar district. She is 45 years old and unmarried, and has a university degree in agronomy. Rima buys and sells fruits and vegetables. Local residents know that she always sells high quality, fresh produce at her stall in the local market. Since she is an agronomist, she only buys high quality goods from wholsaler providers. Now she would like to increase the variety of produce at her market stall. To do that she would like to take out a loan to be repaid over 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Кузина Рима жительница района Гиссар . Возраст 45 лет,незамужем. Образование высшее,по специальности агроном. Рима занимается куплей продажей овощей и фруктов.На местном рынке Гиссара имеет торговую точку,местные жители знают что у Римы всегда можно купить свежий и качественный товар.Так как Рима по специальности аграном она закупает только качественный товар у оптовых поставщиков. В данный момент клиентка хочет увеличить ассортимент своей тороговой точки.Для чего хочет взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев

loans.use: Expanding product variety

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha A., age 30, is married. She collects rice from up country and takes it to Dar es Salaam for sale. She started this business 5 months ago and she is able to make a monthly profit of around $860.

She has taken out one previous loan from Tujijenge Tanzania to expand her business. She hopes for a new loan to add on a smaller business while collecting the money from her clients.

loans.use: to start another business selling wood

loans.name: Lai

texts.en: Mrs. Lai E. is a villager in Kveth Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mrs. Lai E. is a 59 year-old widow with four children, two of whom help their mother while another one is employed in a garment factory. The youngest one is attending school. She is a bed-maker. Since her business has improved, she wants to expand it but has insufficient equipment to do so. Thus, Mrs. Lai E. is requesting a loan to buy more equipment.

loans.use: To buy more equipment to make beds to sell.

loans.name: Ominahon

texts.ru:
Ominahon H. lives in the Gissar district. She is 56 years old, married, and has two children. She has a high school education. Ominahon works in Gissar's communications center. To earn additional income she buys and sells telephone cards used to add credit to mobile phones. She has more than two years of experience in this business. Now she would like to buy more cards than usual from wholesalers. To do this she needs a loan to be paid back over 10 months. She is a joyful and hardworking woman in spite of her age.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Хасанова Оминахон жительница района Гиссар . Возраст 56 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей.Образование среднее.Оминахон работает в Узле связи поселка Гиссар. Дополнительным зароботком является купля продажа телефонных карт для пополнения баланса мобильных телефонов.Имеет опыт работы в этом бизнесе более 2 лет. Сейчас клиентка хочет закупить у оптовых поставщиков телефонных карточек больше обычного.Для чего ей нужен кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.Несмотря на своей возраст она очень жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина.

loans.use: Purchase of goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase clothing in bulk and electrical goods for a small business

loans.name: Sitha

texts.en:
Mr. Sitha P. and his wife are ice-cream makers and sellers in Noneam Totoeng Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mr P. wants to expand their business as it is doing well. Thus, he is requesting a loan to buy a larger ice-cream box than their current one.

Mr. Sitha P. is 43 and the father of four children, three of whom are attending school while the youngest one is too young to work or enroll in school. Previously, Mr. Sitha P. obtained a loan from AMK to start his current business and he succeeded in paying it back. His wife is on the right in the photo.

loans.use: To buy a larger ice-cream box

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more inventory for a small business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase raw materials to keep producing delicious pastelitos.

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
Mariamu M. is single and has a son 10 years old. She has a sewing business which she started 5 years ago and a school canteen which she started one year ago. She keeps her businesses open from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a monthly profit of about US$ 1890.

In the past Mariam has taken out three previous loans from Tujijenge Tanzania to buy a sewing machine. She hopes for a new loan to buy a fridge and expand her business. She belongs to Tiger group.

loans.use: to purchase a fridge

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal N. is a 21-year-old single man who lives in the Ningarhar province. There are eight members in his family and he is the only breadwinner. His father was a farmer, but now he is about 60 years old and cannot work any longer.

Jamal graduated from high school last year; however, due to financial problems, he was not able to begin his higher education. His father was weak and his family was in need of someone to earn money for them. Jamal was brave enough to assume this big responsibility, and to this end he started a small business. First he found some agricultural land for farming in his village. He had good experience in this field because he was helping his father with farming during his schooling.

Finally Jamal has become a full-fledged farmer. He seems an active and studious guy. He is seeking to improve his products as much as possible and tries to find a good market for them. He wants to buy sufficient seeds and some livestock for his lands, so he has requested from AFSG a loan of 30,000 Afghanis. He hopes that, through this loan experience, he will benefit and bring more positive changes in his life and those of his family members.

loans.use: To buy seeds and livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase clothing in bulk for a small business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase shoes and pants to resell in her community.

loans.name: Zawadi

texts.en:
Zawadi M., age 28, is married with a son aged three. She has a men's salon business which she started 2 years ago. She also owns a shop which she started one year ago. She works from 8am to 8pm daily and is able to make a monthly profit of about US$ 2147.

She has taken out one previous loan from Tujijenge Tanzania to expand both businesses. Zawadi hopes for a new loan to expand her shop. She belongs to Tiger group.

loans.use: to buy more stock for the shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase a collection of new perfumes for a small business.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación San Miguel Arcángel, Inc. (FSMA) - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: Thi Uyen's Group

texts.vi:
Mrs. N. Thi Uyen, born in 1966, now lives in Dong Dau, Dong Anh, Hanoi. She wants to borrow 4,452,000 VND (equivalent to 270 USD) to buy contruction materials. Her husband and she own a truck, which is also the only means they have to earn money. Everyday, they go to work together. Her husband drives the truck and she helps her husband carry and transfer goods to the truck. They have two children at school age. On average, they earn around 4,500,000 VND (equivalent to 265 USD) per month. Mrs. Uyen and her husband have consistent income everyday. Thus, it is easier for them to pay the biweekly repayments for the loan. Mrs. Uyen borrows money with her group of 4 other friends:

N. Thi Thanh Doan (born in 1983) with the loan amount of 4,452,000 VND (equivalent to 270 USD) to invest in her retail store.

N. Thi Hue (born in 1976) with the loan amount of 4,452,000 VND (equivalent to 270 USD) to raise chickens.

N. Thi Huyen (born in 1969) with the loan amount of 4,452,000 VND (equivalent to 270 USD) to invest in her small business.

N. Thi Dung (born in 1954) with the loan mount of 4,452,000 VND (equivalent to 270 USD) to sell wooden products.

Translated from Vietnamese by Phuong N., Kiva's Volunteer.

Nguyễn Thị Uyên, sinh năm 1966 (Ms 03040015), hiện đang sống tại Đồng Dầu, Đông Anh, Hà Nội. Mức vốn chị đăng ký vay: 4.452.000 vnđ để đầu tư kinh doanh vật liệu xây dựng. Gia đình chị có 1 ô tô tải cũng là phương tiện để hai vợ chồng chị tạo thu nhập. Hàng ngày, hai vợ chồng chị lại cùng nhau đi làm. Chồng chị lái xe còn chị phụ giúp chồng bốc vác. Hai vợ chồng chị có hai con đang độ tuổi đi học. Thu nhập bình quân của gia đình chị khoảng 4.500.000 vnđ/ tháng. Vợ chòng chị có thu nhập đều theo ngày nên rất phù hợp với vốn vay trả dần. Chị đã mạnh dạn xin vay vốn theo nhóm. Trong nhóm chị có Nguyễn Thị Thanh Doan, sinh năm 1983 (Ms 03040016), mức vay:4.452.000 vnđ để đầu tư kinh doanh hàng tạp hóa. Nguyễn Thị Huế, sinh năm 1976 (Ms 03040017), mức vay: 4.452.000 vnđ để chăn nuôi gà. Nguyên Thị Huyên, sinh năm 1969 (Ms 03040018), mức vay: 4.452.000 vnđ để buôn bán nhỏ. Nguyễn Thị Dung, sinh năm 1954 (Ms 03040019), mức vay: 4.452.000 vnđ để kinh doanh hàng mộc.

loans.use: Buôn bán nhỏ

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase of raw materials to produce cakes, sweeties and natural juices.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase raw materials and other goods to produce food

loans.name: Thi Hong's Group

texts.vi:
Mrs. T. Thi Hong, born in 1953, wants to borrow 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to raise chickens. She has a very difficult life because she is somehow the soL. bread winner in her family. Her husband is a veteran, and the war has stolen his eyes. He is now the president of the Blind Society in Dong Anh district, Hanoi. Mrs. Hong's husband and she now have to provide money for their child who is going to school for associate degree. Her family's average monthly income is around 3,500,000 VND (equivalent to 215 USD). Mrs. Hong is a responsibL. person. Thus, she is voted to become the leader of her group, including

P. Thi Duy (born in 1970) with the loan amount of 3,604,000 VND (equivalent to 220 USD) to invest in her restaurant.

N. Thi Tuyet (born in 1967) with the loan amount of 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to make iron nails.

N. Thi Tam (born in 1976) with the loan amount of 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to raise pigs.

D. Thi Nhung (born in 1978) with the loan amount of 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to invest in her gas sales business.

L. Van Binh (born in 1975) with the loan amount of 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to invest in her electronics repair store.

N. Thi Gai (born in 1952) with the loan amount of 3,604,000 VND (equivalent to 220 USD) to sell rice.

N. Thi Tiem (born in 1945) with the loan amount of 636,000 VND (equivalent to 40 USD) to raise cattL..

N. Thu Ha (born in 1975) with the loan amount of 4,028,000 VND (equivalent to 245 USD) to sell frozen food.

Translated from Vietnamese by Phuong N., Kiva's Volunteer.

Tạ Thị Hồng, sinh năm 1953(Ms 03020011), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđ để chăn nuôi gà. Gia đình cô rất vât vả vì kinh tế chủ yếu tập trung trên vai cô. Chồng cô là bộ đội phục viên, chiến tranh đã cướp đi đôi mắt của ông, nay ông là chủ tịch hội người mù huyên Đông Anh, Hà Nội. Hiên nay, vợ chồng cô chỉ phải nuôi 1 con đang học trung cấp.Thu nhập bình quân của gia đình cô khoảng 3.500.000 vnđ. Cô là người có uy tín nên dược bầu làm nhóm trưởng nhóm vay vốn. Trong nhóm chị còn có: Phạm thị Duy, sinh năm 1970(Ms 03020014), mức vay: 3.604.000 để đầu tư cửa hàng ăn uống. Nguyễn Thị Tuyết, sinh năm 1967(Ms 03020007), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđ để kinh doanh làmđinh sắt. Nguyên Thị Tâm, sinh năm 1976(Ms 03020015), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđđể chăn nuôi lợn. Đỗ Thị Nhung, sinh năm 1978(Ms 03020013), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđ để kinh doanh cửa hàng bán ga. Lê văn Bình, sinh năm 1975(Ms 03020012), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđ để kinh doanh cửa hàng sửa chữa điện tử, điện lạnh. Nguyễn Thị Gái, sinh năm 1952(Ms 03020009). Mức vay: 3.604.000 vnđ để kinh doanh của hàng gạo. Nguyễn Thị Tiệm, sinh năm 1945(Ms 03020010), mức vay: 636.000 vnđ để chăn nuôi. Nguyễn Thu Hà, sinh năm 1975(Ms 03020006), mức vay: 4.028.000 vnđ để bán hàng đông lạnh

loans.use: raise cattle

loans.name: Selmira

texts.en:
Selmira is a young woman living in the village Soko, near Gračanica. She is 21 years old, married, with no children yet. Her husband works abroad in Croatia, and Selmira supports herself by working on her farm. This is her 1st loan request, in the amount of 600 KM (US$ 500) and she will use this to support her farming business.

Selmira grows a lot of corn and will be using it to make silage, which she will later use as feed for her animals. Silage is made from grains like corn and is produced in the summer so that livestock will have plenty of food to eat come winter. This process is time intensive and complicated, so Selmira may need to hire someone to help her, as well as paying for the use of machinery that will aid in the process. This loan from Kiva will help pay for that.

loans.use: To rent machinery needed to make silage from her corn

loans.name: Gulnisso

texts.ru:
Gulnisso S. lives in the Bohtar district of Tajikistan. She is 35 years old, married, and has 5 children. Gulnisso has a stall at the local market, where she sells julienned carrots. This type of product is in high demand in our country, since the national dish is pilaf, which requires such thinly sliced carrots. Gulnisso would like to purchase carrots from local small farmers. She needs money to do that, so she decided to take out a 9-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Сафарова Гулниссо жительница района Бохтар. Возраст 35 лет, замужем , имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее. Гулниссо на местном рынке имеет торговую точку, где торгует нарезанной соломкой морковью.Этот вид продукции очень востребован в нашей стране. Так как национальным блюдом считается плов.Для которого нужна нарезанная соломкой морковь. Гулниссо хочет закупить у крестьян морковки.Для чего ей нужны деньги .Она решила взять кредит сроком на 9 месяцев.

loans.use: Buying goods

loans.name: Maja

texts.en:
Maja is a young woman from the town of Doboj. She is 24 years old, single, and working as a nurse at a local hospital to support herself. Her salary is less than US$ 300 a month, and this is not enough to cover all living expenses. Like many people in Bosnia, Maja grows vegetables & fruit that she uses for herself and to sell around her town.

Maja wants to earn some more income selling her vegetables this year, specifically corn, before the season ends. She will be busy planting in the next months and has requested a loan in the amount of 1200 KM (US$ 1,000) to help pay for seeds & other supplies to use for this.

loans.use: To buy seeds & supplies for farming

loans.name: Sadafmoh

texts.ru:
Sadafmoh F. lives in the city of Qurgan-Tube. At 32 years old she is a widow with two children. Sadafmoh buys and sells dried fruit at the local city market. It is a type of business she has been involved in for over six years. As the family's only source of income, her business allows her to support her children. At this time Sadafmoh would like to expand the business, which will require cash funds. She decided to take out a 10-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Файзуллавеа Садафмох жительница города Курган-Тюбе .Возраст 32 года , вдова , имеет 2 детей. Садафмох занимается куплей продажей фруктов на местном рынке города. Занимается этим видом деятельности более 6 лет. Этот бизнес позволяет ей содержать своих детей. Так как является единстьвенным источником дохода ее семьи. В данный момент клиентка хочет расширить свой бизнес .Для чего ей нужны денежные средства. Онв решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: Expanding market stall selection

loans.name: Branka

texts.en:
Branka lives right outside the town of Doboj, with her husband and one child. Her husband works in a power plant in the town of Ugyevik, and Branka works as a nurse at a local hospital. Branka took it upon herself to start another business selling clothes door-to-door and at the market. She does this whenever she is not working her shifts as a nurse. Since it’s not great pay at the hospital, she is able to supplement the family income and help out more with this side business.

This 1200 KM (US$ 1000) loan from Zene za Zene will go towards buying more clothes for Branka to sell. Since summer is almost over, Branka needs to stock up on warmer clothes to sell for fall and winter.

loans.use: To buy clothes for re-selling

loans.name: Mehrinisso

texts.ru:
Mehrinisso Zaripovna G., 48, lives in Khuroson district. She and her husband have six children. Mehrinisso has been in business for six years. She currently sells cloth for making national dresses as well as other household goods. She buys her goods wholesale and sells them on for a profit. This business allows Mehrinisso to support her large family. Right now, Mehrinisso would like to purchase additional inventory. In order to do this, she has applied for a ten-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer.

Ганиева Мехриниссо Зариповна жительница района Хуросон . Возраст 48 лет , замужем , имеет 6 детей. Мехриниссо более 6 лет занимается торговлей. Она торгует тканями для пошива национального платья и другими товарами народного потребления.Этот вид деятельности позволяет ей содержать большую семью. Она покупает у оптовых поставщиков товар и реализует его в розницу. В данное время она хочет закупить больше товара.Для чего ей нужны деньги и она решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Hojar

texts.ru:
Hojar K., 42, lives in Khuroson district. She and her husband have four children. Hojar is a trained nurse and works in Khuroson district's local clinic. Hojar would like to keep a cow at home to provide milk for her family. She has saved up some money to buy a cow, but since prices have gone up, Hojar has decided to apply for a loan so she can buy the cow as soon as possible. She plans to repay her loan within ten months.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer.

Каримова Ходжар жительница района Хуросон. Возраст 42 года, замужем , имеет 4 детей. По специальности медицинская сестра. Работает в местной поликлинике района Хуросон.В данное время у клиентки нет в доме дойной коровы, которая давала бы молоко. У Ходжар есть свои денежные сбережения на которые она хотела бы купить дойную корову для своей большой семьи.Но цены на сельхозживотные выросли и она решила взять кредит. Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Mihreta

texts.en:
Mireta is a 47-year-old woman living in Brijesnici, a small village near the town of Doboj. She is a widow and has 6 children, ranging in age from 18 to 28. One of her sons is living with her temporarily, but the rest of her children have moved out. Mireta has a small monthly pension, but otherwise supports herself selling milk.

Mireta is requesting this 3rd loan from Zene za Zene to buy food for her cows. She wants to make sure they have plenty to eat and hopes keep them healthy over the winter. Since food for cows is at an all-time high, she believes this will be the best investment she can make in her business right now.

loans.use: To buy food for her dairy cows

loans.name: Safargul

texts.ru:
Safargul Yatimovna S., 44, lives in Khuroson district. She and her husband have eight children. Safargul has a secondary school education. She owns a small grocery store and has over six years of business experience. Safargul's income from the store allows her to support her large family; all of her children are still in school. Currently, Safargul would like to purchase cold drinks wholesale for her store. In order to do this, she has applied for a five-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer. Солиева Сафаргул Ятимовна жительница района Хуросон. Возраст 44 года , замужем , имеет 8 детей. Образование среднее. Клиентка имеет небольшой продуктовый магазин . Имеет опыт в бизнесе более 6 лет . Доход от магазина позволяет ей содержать свою большую семью .Так как дети Сафаргул пока еще все ходят в школу. В данный момент клиентка хочет закупить у оптовых поставщиков прохладительные напитки.Для чего она хочет получить кредит.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 5 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase more goods for sale

loans.name: Mahmady

texts.ru:
Mahmady D. is 43 and lives in Fayzabad district. He and his wife have one child. Mahmady has a secondary school education. For the last 15 years, he has been selling fruits and vegetables for a living. As melons are in season right now, Mahmady is buying watermelons and muskmelons wholesale to sell. Since Mahmady's wife stays home caring for their child, his business helps him support the family. Mahmady would like to increase the size of his business. In order to achieve this goal, he has applied for a 12-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer.

Давлатов Махмади житель района Файзабад.Возраст 43 года , женат , имеет 1 ребенка. Образование среднее. Махмади занимается куплей продажей фруктов и овощей вот уже более 15 лет .Так как сейчас сезон бахчевых культур клиент занимается куплей продажей арбузов и дынь . Этот вид деятельности помогает ему содержать свою семью.Так как жена клиента занята домашним хозяйствои и воспитанием ребенка.Махмади хочет увеличить масштабы своего бизнеса .Для чего решил взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru:
Rano G. is 46 and lives in Vahdat district. She and her husband have four children. Rano has a secondary school education and grows vegetables for a living. She has a small plot of land where she can plant everything her family needs. She sells the rest of her produce at the local market or to her neighbors. Right now it's the best time to re-plant and Rano wants to take advantage of the moment. She needs good quality seeds and mineral fertilizer in order to plant. In order to buy these supplies, she has applied for a 10-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer.

Гафорова Рано жительница района Вахдат. Возраст 56 лет , замужем , имеет 4 детей.Образование среднее. Рано занимается растениводством.Она имеет небольшой участок земли , где сеет все необходимое для своей большой семьи. А лишнее реализует на местном рынке и соседям. Сейчас самое время для повторного посева и этим моментов хочет воспользоваться Рано .Но для посева ей нужны качественне семена и минеральные удобренияюДля этого она хочет получить кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Mehrojidin

texts.ru:
Mehrojidin O. is 26 and lives in Vahdat district. He and his wife have two children. Mehrojidin has a university degree in accounting. However, this kind of work doesn't pay well in Tajikistan, so instead he drives a taxi for a living. He has been in business with his own cab for four years. Mehrojidin's taxi service is his family's only source of income, and he would like to repair his car. In order to do this, he needs some money and has applied for a 10-month loan.

Translated from Russian by Susie Armitage, Kiva Volunteer.

Орифджонов Мехроджидин житель раойна Вахдат . Возраст 26 лет , женат , имеет 2 детей. Образование высшее, по специальности бухгалтер .По специальности клиент не работает так как заработная плата маленькая. Мехроджидин вот уже как 4 года работает таксистом на собственной машине. Этот бизнес является единственныи источником его семьи. Сейчас клиент хочет сделать ремонт своей машины, для чего ему нужны деньги и он решил взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To repair his car

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Saodat T. lives in the Vahdat region. She is 45 years old, married and has four children. Saodat has been doing animal husbandry for more than fifteen years. She buys young calves at the local market, feeds them for about 45 days and then sells at a more profitable price. Her big and friendly family is helping her too. At this time Saodat wants to buy another calf for feeding and resale. She decided to apply for a loan with a 10 months term.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Тилакова Саодат жительница района Вахдат. Возраст 45 лет.Замужем , имеет 4 детей.Саодат более 15 лет занимается животноводством.Она покупает на месном рынке молодых бычков , откармливает их в течение 45 дней и продает по более выгодной ей цене.Помогают ей ее большая и дружная семья. В данный момент клиентка хочет купить очередного бычка для откормки и продажи.Для чего она решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy a calf

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 50-year-old woman from a small place called Doborovci, near the town of Gračanica. She doesn't work but she does agriculture and cattle breeding. That is an assured way to bring in additional monthly money for her family. She is married and she has 2 married daughters. Her husband has been working for 15 years in a concrete factory and he earns about 1000 KM (US$ 810) monthly.

This is Fatima's first loan at MCO WWI in the amount of 600 KM (US$ 500) and Fatima intends to use this loan to buy a cow because she has all the conditions for cattle breeding. She has a big place that she will set aside for a future barn and she hopes that she will buy a good cow with a lot of milk in order to sell milk and earn additional money for herself and her husband.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Habiba

texts.en:
Habiba is 23-years-old and married with two children. Her children are currently in school. To support her husband, she has been selling rice, tin tomatoes, vegetable oil and other groceries in the local market. She has loyal clients. Habiba is happy with the first loan she received. Sinapi provided her with working capital to start her trade.

Habiba wants to use the next loan to expand her inventory to enable her make better income to meet her family’s needs. Habiba is a member of the group called Isaiah. Members agree to guarantee for each other as social collateral to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy increased stock of rice, vegetable oil, spices, and other goods

loans.name: Ophelia

texts.en:
Ophelia is 32-years-old and a mother of three children. The children are currently in school. Selling used clothing is a very big market in Ghana because brand new clothes are very expensive for the economically poor. Therefore, selling of used clothing has created a market for many women like Ophelia.

Ophelia wants to use the loan to buy more bales of used clothing to increase her inventory. She believes this loan will help her save for her children’s future and also to rent a store to trade. She is member of the group called “Ebe ba mu” (It has shall come to pass). Members agree to guarantee for each other as social collateral to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.ru:
Zulhumor Ganievna O. lives in the Gissar region. She is 26 years old and has secondary education. Zulhumor lives with her parents who are retired. She does tailoring and sews national Tajik clothing and wedding gowns. She has been doing this for more than six years. At this time she wants to buy fabrics and beads for sewing of dresses and costumes. She took the advice of her family and decided to apply for a loan with a 10 months term.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Орзукулова Зулхумор Ганиевна жительница района Гисаар.Возраст 26 лет, образование среднее.Зулхумор живет вместе с родителями пенсионерами.Клинтка занимается пошивом и реализацией национального платья и свадебных нарядов.Этим видом деятельности она занимается более 6 лет .В данное время клиентка хочет закупить ткань и бисер для пошива платьев и нарядов. Посоветовавшись с близкими она решила взять кредить сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy fabrics

loans.name: Sharifa

texts.ru:
Sharifa K. lives in the Gissar region. She is 59 years old, married and has four children. She has secondary education. Sharifa is in the retail of clothing and shoes. She has a vendor space on the central market of Gissar. She has been in this business for more than twelve years. At this time Sharifa wants to buy additional merchandise for resale. Beginning in august the residents will start preparing their children for school and the business should pick up. She needs good quality and quantity of merchandise and this is why Sharifa has decided to apply for a loan with a 10 months term.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Каримова Шарифа жительница района Гиссар.Возраст 59 лет, замужем , имеет 4 детей. Образование среднее. Шарифа занимается куплей продажей одежды и обуви .На центральном рынке района Гиссар она имеет торговую точку. Этим видом деятельности она занимаетмя более 12 лет .В данный момент клиентка хочет закупить товар для розничной торговли. С августа жители начнут готовить детей к школе и торговля должна быть хорошей.Для этого нужно хорошее качество и количество товара.Поэтому Шарифа решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев

loans.use: To increase the variety of merchandise

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Larisa Konstantinovna T. lives in the Gissar region. She is 35 years old and has one child. She has secondary education and is in the retail business of selling basic, every day needs goods. She has more than twelve years of experience in this field. This business is the main source of income for her family. At this time Larisa wants to increase the variety of items offered at her store. This is why she decided to apply for a loan with a 10 month repayment plan.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Царева Лариса Констатиновна жительница района Гиссар. Возраст 35 лет , имеет 1 ребенка. Образование среднее . Лариса занимается куплей продажей товаров повседневного спроса . Имеет опыт в этой деятельности более 12 лет .Этот вид деятельности является основным источником дохода ее семьи. В данный момент Лариса хочет увеличить ассортимент своей торговой очки. Для чего она решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Ochildi

texts.ru:
Ochildi Barotovich M. lives in the Gissar region. He is 47 years old and has two children. He has secondary education. Ochildi has a vendor space at a local Gissar market where he sells shoes and women's clothes. He is the sole provider for the family and his wife is a housewife. Ochildi has more than 25 years of experience in this business. At this time he wants to buy additional inventory for resale and for this he needs funding. He has decided to come to this organization for a loan which he plans to pay off within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Мирзоев Очилди Баротович житель района Гиссар. Возраст 47 лет, женат , имеет 2 детей. Образование среднее. Очилди имеет торговую точку на местном рынке района Гиссар. Где занимается куплей продажей обуви и женской одежды. Он является единственным кормильцем в семье , такак жена клиента домохозяйка.Очилди имеет опыт в бизнесе более 25 лет. В данный момент клиент хочет закупить товар для дальнейшей реализации.Для чего ему нужны деньги .Он обратился в нашу организацию за кредитом, планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Rohat

texts.ru:
Rohat K. lives in the Gissar region. She is 48 years old, married and has three children. She has secondary education. Rohat has been in the retail business of selling children's toys for more than seventeen years. This business is the only source of income for her family because at this time her husband is unemployed. She has a vendor space at the local Gissar market. The residents of Gissar region cannot walk by without stopping at her lot because she always has a wide variety of different toys. Rohat is also a very polite and kind woman. She wants to take out a loan with a 10 months repayment plan to buy toys from wholesellers for retail.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Курбонова Рохат жительница района Гиссар. Возраст 48 лет, замужем , имеет 3 детей. Образование среднее.Рохат вот уже более 17 лет занимается куплей продажей мягких игрушек.Этот вид деятельности явялется единственным источником дохода ее семьи , так как в данное время ее муж тне работает. Она торгует на местном рынке района Гиссар .Жители района Гиссар,прийдя на рынок не могут пройти мимо ее торговой точки.Так как там всегда очень много разнообразных игрушек.Сама Рохат очень вежливая и добродушная женщина. Клиентка хочет взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев для закупки у оптовых поставщиков товар для розничной торговли.

loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Nigorahon

texts.ru:
Nigorahon K. lives in the Vahdat town. She is 32 years old. She had secondary education and works as a secretary. In addition, she is in the business of cattle farming. At her house, she has one milk cow, which provides her with milk. Nagorahon uses this milk to produce dairy products. The demand had risen, and she decided to purchase an additional milk cow. To finance the purchase, she would like to obtain a loan for 15 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Каримова Нигорахон жительница города Вахдат . Возраст 32 года.Образование средне-техническое.Нигорахон работает секретаршей.Клиентка так же занимается животноводством. У ней в доме естьодна дойная корова,которая дает молоко.Из которого клиентка производит кисло-молочную продукцию и реализует соседям. Но спрос на ее продукцию возрос и поэтому Нигорахон решила купить еще одну дойную корову.Поэтому клиннтка хочет взять кредит сроком на 15 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
This lady dedicates herself to the distribution of all types of items (blankets, gifts, etc.), allowing payment to be made on credit or in installments. She has been a widow for twelve years, single-handedly supporting five children who are now grown and live on their own. The oldest is in sales and lives in Santa Cruz, while three others live in Cochabamba. The youngest works with her and lives in La Paz. Viki, as she is known, rents out a room and the kitchen in her house. She lives alone, and always looks out for her seven grandchildren. The loan would help greatly, given that it would allow her to buy a vehicle better distribute her merchandise. Having an improved means of transportation would also economize her time so she can devote more of herself to her grandchildren.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora se dedica a la distribución de todo (frazadas, regalos y otros) los da a crédito o sea para que paguen a cuotas, es viuda hace 12 años, sola saco adelante a 5 hijos todos ya mayores edad e independientes, la mayor se dedica al comercio y radica en Santa Cruz, tres de ellos viven en Cochabamba y la menor que trabaja con ella radica en La Paz, Viki como la conocen arrienda un cuarto y su cocina vive sola y siempre esta pendiente de sus nietos que son siete. El crédito le ayudara mucho ya que podra comprar un vehiculo para que pueda distribuir mejor su mercadería y así economizar su tiempo y así podrá dedicarse a sus nietos.

loans.use: Invest in the purchase of a vehicle to help her business.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes has a store with booths, in which she sells drinks and candies. She lives with her whole family. She is a hard worker who currently does not own her own home, but her plans include at some point buying a small plot of land with the help of her husband. The loan helps her a great deal given that it increases her working capital and therefore her income. This allows her to save money for the land she hopes to purchase down the line, and that way she'll someday have something to leave to her family.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

La sra. Lourdes tiene una tienda de cabinas y a la vez es licorería y venta de golosinas, vive con toda su familia, la señora es muy trabajadora, no tiene casa propia y en sus planes a otro plazo es la de comprar un terrenito con el apoyo de su esposo. El crédito le ayuda mucho ya que incrementa su capital y por tanto sus ingresos incrementan y puede ahorrar para su terreno y así poder dejar algo a su familia

loans.use: Investment capital (purchase of cards).

loans.name: Yeimy

texts.es:
Yeimy, as she is known, is very young but also extremely enterprising. She is nineteen years old, lives with her parents, and is the oldest of the daughters. She has three younger brothers. She is truly a great example to everyone as she is studying nursing at the public university of El Alto (UPEA). She helps support her household a great deal. The loan will be immensely helpful as it will allow her to buy a computer so she can complete the university requirements and that way become an outstanding professional.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Yeimy como la conocen es bastante joven pero muy emprendedora, tiene 19 años de edad, vive con sus papas, es la mayor de las hijas tiene 3 hermanos menores. Y realmente es el ejemplo ya que estudia enfermería en la universidad pública de El Alto UPEA apoya bastante a su casa. El crédito le ayuda mucho ya que comprara una computadora para poder cumplir con las exigencias de la universidad y así ser una buena profesional

loans.use: Investment capital.

loans.name: Gulharam

texts.ru:
Gulharam V. lives in the town of Vahdat. She is 48 years old, divorced, and has 4 children. She has been in the business of cattle farming and production of dairy products for the last 25 years. This is the single source of income for her family since her children are still students in primary and secondary schools. At this moment in time, she would like to purchase one more milk cow. To finance this purchase she decided to obtain a loan for 15 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Вохидова Гулхарам жительница района Вахдат.Возраст 48 лет, разведенна, имеет 4 детей. Гулхарам вот уже 25 лет как занимается животноводством и производством кисло-молочной продукции. Этот вид деятельности является единственным источником дохода ее большой семьи.Так как дети клиентки еще школьники и студенты. Вданный момент клиентка хочет купить еще одну дойную корову. Для чего ей нужны деньги и она решила взять кредит сроком на 15 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Amar Khary

texts.fr:
Amar Khary N. is a member of the Jammy Xaléyi bank. He's married and the father of one child. He's seeking this loan in view of increasing his income. He is very energetic and his business consists in buying cosmetics and fashion fabrics in Mauritania, that he then resells on the local market.

Translated from French by Patrick Stadelmann, Kiva Volunteer.

Amar khary N. est un sociétaire de la caisse de jammy xaléyi .il est marié et père d'un enfant .c'est dans l'optique d'améliorer ses revenus qu'il demande ce pret .il est très dynamique et son activité consiste à aller s'approvisionner en mauritanie en produits cosmétiques et en tissus de mode pour venir les revendre sur le marché local.

loans.use: To buy and resell cosmetics and fabrics

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Ousmane D. has been a member of IMCEC in Thies for three years. He's single and without children. He works as a teacher and lives in the Sampathé neighborhood. He is seeking this loan to repair his taxi, which constitutes his second source of income.

Translated from French by Patrick Stadelmann, Kiva Volunteer.

ousmane D. est membre à imcec de thies depuis trois ans.c'est un célibataire sans enfants et est enseignant de profession.il habite au quartier sampathé .il sollicite ce pret pour réparer son taxi qui traine quelques pannes et qui est sa deuxième source de revenu .

loans.use: To repair his taxi

loans.name: Zulpha

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 48-year-old Zulpha S.. She is married and In 2000, Zulpha established her grocery business. Zulpha requires a loan in order to purchase additional stocks of rice, beans, and vegetables. In the future, Zulpha plans to increase the quantity and range of her inventory. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of beans, rice, and vegetables

loans.name: Mwanahawa

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is Mwanahawa C. who is married and has four children aged between 25 and 38. In 2005, Mwanahawa established her bun business. Mwanahawa requires a loan in order to purchase additional wheat flour, and cooking oil. In the future, Mwanahawa plans to increase the production. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional wheat flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Zuhura

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 30-year-old Zuhura M.. She is married, and has three children aged between 4 and 12. In 2004, Zuhura established her poultry business. Zuhura has already received and successfully repaid two loans from SELFINA, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase additional chicks and feed. In the future, Zuhura plans to to start another business. She thanks you for your support.

Raising kuku is a popular micro-business in Tanzania, especially amongst SELFINA clients. In fact, if you are a regular lender on kiva.org, you may be tired of reading about kuku. Who or what are ‘kuku’, you may ask. Kuku means chickens in Swahili, and raising them for sale is popular for a number of reasons.

Firstly, they require little start-up capital. You can start with one or two, and either add to them as you go or wait for them to multiple naturally! Secondly, they require little space, so sometimes you can just let them run around in your garden or compound. Thirdly, while they are growing they produce eggs, which can either be sold to provide a supplementary source of income, or eaten to provide a supplementary source of protein. I’m sure there are hundreds of other reasons why raising kuku is so popular (maybe they are friendlier than other animals? Prettier?), but this is all time and space will allow.

loans.use: To purchase additional chicks and pigs.

loans.name: Pilly

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 28 year-old Pilly N.. She is married and has two children aged 3 and 7. In 2000, Pilly established her grocery business. Pilly requires a loan in order to purchase additional stocks of rice. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately US $87. In the future, Pilly plans to incease the quantity and range of her inventory. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of rice, beans, and vegetables for re-sale

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 30-year-old Fatuma S.. She is married and has three children aged between 4 and 15. In 2005, Fatuma established her café business. Fatuma requires a loan in order to purchase additional rice, beans, and cooking oil. In the future, Fatuma plans to open another business. She thanks you for your support.

When you see a SELFINA entrepreneur whose business title is ‘restaurant’ or ‘café’, you may have to adjust your mental image of what that is. A local restaurant or café in Tanzania usually consists of a rough wooden table and some long, wooden benches, with the sky as a ceiling. Such places don’t even appear in the Lonely Planet’s budget guide, but if you’re looking for a cheap and tasty meal and someone to have a chat with, this is the place to be. The food is all-local; rice, ugali (a hot sticky dough made from maize flour), plantain (a cooked savoury banana), all served with beans, vegetables, meat, and a variety of yummy sauces.

loans.use: To purchase additional rice, beans, and cooking oil

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Sero Lease and Finance Ltd. (SELFINA) - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 34-year-old Joyce M.. She is single and has no children. In 2008, Joyce established her transport business. Joyce requires a loan in order to to purchase a motorcycle for hiring out. In the future, Joyce plans to buy additional motorcycles. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase an additional motorcycle for hiring out

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia dedicates herself to the sale of all types of cheeses, such as the chaqueño and San Javier which are in great demand in the local markets. She lives alone in a small apartment which has a bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. She has one daughter who now has a home of her own, and they only see each other some weekends. She used to have other people bring back her cheeses, or she received them by parcel post. Now, she personally travels to buy them herself at better prices.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

La Sra. Julia, se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de quesos como ser el chaqueño y el san Javier, muy solicitados dentro de los mercados de la ciudad, vive sola en un pequeño departamento que cuenta con un dormitorio, baño y cocina, tiene una sola hija la cual ya tiene su hogar, y solo se ven algunos fines de semana. Ella hacia traer los quesos con otras personas o los recibía en encomienda, ahora ella personalmente viaja para comprarlos a menor precio.

loans.use: Purchase additional merchandise.

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 34-year-old Janeth M.. She is married and has three children aged between 4 and 14. In 1998, Janeth established her grocery business. She opens her business 7 days a week and 12 hours a day. She is assisted by her husband. Janeth has already received and successfully repaid one loan from SELFINA and now requires a new loan in order to purchase additional stocks of rice, beans, and vegetables. In the future, Janeth plans to start another business. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of beans, rice, and vegetables

loans.name: Hidaya

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 38-year-old Hidaya B.. She is married and has four children aged between 4 and 18. In 2004, Hidaya established her clothing business. Hidaya requires a loan in order to purchase additional stocks of cloth. In the future, Hidaya plans to increase the quantity and range of her inventory. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-Leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of cloth

loans.name: Hamisa

texts.en:
Mambo from Dar es Salaam, Tanzania! This is 38-year-old Hamisa C.. She is married and has two children aged 2 and 14. In 2006, Hamisa established her café business. Hamisa requires a loan in order to purchase additional rice, beans, and cooking oil. In the future, Hamisa plans to increase the quantity and range of her inventory. She thanks you for your support.

When you see a SELFINA entrepreneur whose business title is ‘restaurant’ or ‘café’, you may have to adjust your mental image of what that is. A local restaurant or café in Tanzania usually consists of a rough wooden table and some long, wooden benches, with the sky as a ceiling. Such places don’t appear even in the Lonely Planet’s budget guide, but if you’re looking for a cheap and tasty meal and someone to have a chat with, this is the place to be. The food is all-local: rice, ugali (a hot sticky dough, made from maize flour), plantain (a cooked savoury banana), all served with beans, vegetables, meat, and a variety of yummy sauces.

loans.use: To purchase additional beans, rice, and cooking oil

loans.name: Noemí

texts.es:
Noemí is used to the hard labor required of working in the countrysiD.. She is also a person with much experience raising livestock, knowing how to care for them to later make a good profit. Several years ago, she decided to abandon farming in its entirety because unpredictable weather was destroying her harvests. She then began concentrating more on livestock, although she still grows a few items such as corn, potatoes and wheat. She has been in business doing this noble labor for over thirty years, and it allowed her to proviD. for all her childrens’ needs. Each day, Noemí rises early to clean her stable and take her cattle out to the pasture to graze. What she needs now is to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her livestock, and to prepare her land for planting seeds. It is for these reasons that she is requesting this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Noemí acostumbra a trabajar duro en las tareas del campo, ella es también, una persona D. amplia experiencia en la crianza D. vacunos, por ello sabe cómo nutrirlos a fin D. que en adelante obtenga mejores ganancias. Hace varios años atrás que dejó D. dedicarse por entero al cultivo D. la tierra, debido a las inclemencias climáticas que malograban sus sembríos, entonces se concentró más en las ganadería, aunque cultiva algunos productos como el maíz, papa y trigo; lleva 30 años dedicándose a esta noble labor, y con ella pudo sostener las necesidades D. todos sus hijos. Cada día, Noemí se levanta temprano para limpiar su establo y llevar a sus vacas a un lugar apropiado para pastear. Lo que ella necesita ahora es comprar alimento balanceado para sus vacas y preparar su campo D. cultivo para la siembra. Por ello solicita el presente préstamo.

loans.use: Purchase nutritional feed for her cattle, and ready her land to plant crops.

loans.name: Coral

texts.es:
Coral is a very hard working woman who is 33 year old and the mother of a small 8-year old daughter. Her regular work has allowed her to always provide for herself, her aging mother and her young daughter. She is a farmer and also tends to her livestock. She plants primarily corn, potatoes, and beans, among other things. Additionally, she raises goats and pigs. Coral provides the sole means of financial support for her family. For this reason, she puts forth the greatest of efforts to be able to earn enough to live on day-to-day. Coral has been running her enterprise for five years, and currently has set herself the goal of improving her next harvest. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest into the purchase of fertilizers and additional animals to raise. Please help support Coral so she may continue to work.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Coral es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 33 años y es madre de una pequeña de 8, su trabajo constante le ha permitido sustentar las necesidades para ella, su anciana madre y su pequeña. Ella es agricultora y ganadera, cultiva principalmente maíz, papa, arvejas entre otros productos. Adicionalmente, se dedica a la crianza de animales como carneros y cerdos. Coral es el único sostén de su familia, por ello, se esfuerza al máximo para poder conseguir ese sustento diario. Coral viene trabajando de esta manera desde hace 5 años, tiene ahora como meta, mejorar su próxima cosecha, para lo cual está solicitando un préstamo que invertirá en la compra de abonos y algunos animales. Apoya a Coral para que siga trabajando.

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers for her crops, and animals to increase her earnings raising livestock.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel is a self-sacrificing mother who, together with her husband, looks for a way to give their children all the best. They established a small business offering natural remedies and, concurrently, her husband provides massages, steam baths and other treatments for persons who suffer from stress, back pain, etc. They have dedicated themselves to providing these services for the past three years, and it has afforded them the ability to support their two children ages five and one. They hope to provide them with a quality education. Their goal is to be able to open a natural healing clinic, for which they are requesting this loan to invest into equipment for their establishment. They also would like to plant onions and carrots on a small plot of land that they own. Please help support this enterprising family so they may make progress.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Isabel es una madre abnegada que junto a su esposo buscan darle lo mejor a sus hijos. Ellos establecieron un pequeño negocio, ofrecen medicina natural, a la vez, su esposo realiza masajes, baños a vapor y otros tratamientos para las personas que tienen recalco, dolores en la columna vertebral, y demás. Son ya más de 3 años en los cuales se dedican a esto, lo que les permite sostener a sus 2 hijos de 5 y 1 año, para que en el futuro puedan acceder a una buena educación. Su meta es poder abrir una clínica de medicina natural, para ellos solicitan este préstamo que será invertido en el equipamiento de su establecimiento, así como también en la siembra de cebolla y zanahoria en unas pequeñas tierras que poseen. Apoya esta empresa familiar para su progreso.

loans.use: Equipment for their natural medicine business, and to open a small clinic.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana’s life is clearly an example of surmounting obstacles, who started out working as a humble laborer at a livestock stable. During those eight years, she saved her money with the goal of one day having her own stable of animals at her house so she could still care for her two small children. For a little over a year now, she achieved her dream and feels extremely satisfied. Now, she must purchase more cows to build her stable. As a result of her cattle activities, she is able to sell the milk they produce which is why she is meticulous in caring for her animals. In addition to her livestock, she also plants potatoes, corn, beans and peas. The loan she is requesting is to rent a tractor so she can prepare her lands for her crops, and also to buy balanced feed for her cattle.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

La vida de Liliana es un claro ejemplo de superación, ella empezó a trabajar humildemente siendo peón en un establo ganadero durante varios años, ahorró durante todos esos años con la meta de tener su propio establo de animales en su casa para no descuidar el cuidado de sus dos pequeños hijos. Hace más de un año pudo lograr este sueño de que se siente muy satisfecha, ahora debe adquirir más vacas para tener un gran establo ganadero. A consecuencia, vende la leche que sus vacas producen, por ello Liliana es muy minuciosa su cuidado; además de esto, también siembra papa, maíz, habas y arveja. El préstamo que solicita es para el alquiler de un tractor para la preparación de su tierra y comprar alimento balanceado para sus vacas.

loans.use: Purchase nutritional feed for her cattle and rental of a tractor to use in preparing her farmlands for planting crops.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario is a very enterprising woman who takes advantages of any opportunity that presents itself. Five years ago, her mother transferred her general store business to her and she has run it to this day. She sells essential items for daily use. Rosario is content because this business has brought her many satisfactions, and despite fluctuating prices she remains stable. She has one 8-year old child, for whom she plays the role of both mother and father. She yearns for his well-being and to have the ability to provide him with an education at the best schools. Rosario needs a loan to purchase a greater quantity of merchandise and to make improvements to her store. Please support Rosario in her quest to prosper and help build a more promising future for her and her child.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Rosario es una mujer emprendedora que aprovecha las oportunidades que se le ponen en frente, hace 5 años su madre le traspasó su negocio, una bodega, y hoy sigue en pie esta tienda, en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad. Rosario se siente satisfecha porque este negocio le ha traído muchas satisfacciones, a pesar de los altibajos de los precios, ella supo permanecer firme. Ella tiene un hijo de 8 años, es padre y madre para él, y vela por su bienestar y por brindarle una educación en colegios de buena calidad.Rosario necesita un préstamo para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y mejorar la infraestructura de su local. Ayuda a Rosario a prosperar y ver un futuro prometedor para ella y su hija.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her general store inventory, and make improvements to its infrastructure.

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
María is a hard-working woman whose enthusiasm and determination to improve her business stem from her desire to secure the well-being of her 8 year old child. She studied cosmetology and with her savings managed to open her own beauty salon. Each day, she rises early to get her child ready for school and shortly thereafter she opens her shop. She offers many types of services including makeup, haircuts, manicures and creative hair styling. María turns to this medium to request a loan that she will invest into the purchase of peroxide, skin creams, mineral mud, hair dyes and other products necessary for her work. With her promise to faithfully meet her payment obligations, María thanks you in advance for any support you may be able to provide.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

María es una mujer muy trabajadora, su ánimo y empeño en la mejora de su negocio es por el bienestar de su pequeño de 8 años. Ella estudió cosmetología y con sus ahorros logró abrir su propio salón de belleza.Diariamente se levanta, alista a su pequeño para la escuela y se va prontamente a abrir su establecimiento, ella ofrece servicios de todo tipo en maquillaje, corte de cabello, manicura y diversos y creativos peinados. María recurre a este medio para solicitar un préstamo que invertirá en la compra de oxigenta, cremas de belleza, barra mineral, tintes de cabello y otros insumos necesarios para su trabajo. Con la promesa de cumplir fielmente con sus pago, María agradece desde ya el apoyo que le puedan brindar.

loans.use: Purchase supplies and materials for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana is 24 year old woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. She works in a commercial establishment that she owns with her family and contains a place where she offers typing and photocopying services, which are in high demand in the area. Diana's goal is that family and her grow the project, opening branches in other areas. This mentality of getting ahead is what carries her to improve every day and only one year after having started she can already see the benefits. This time Diana is requesting a loan to increase her work capital and promote her business with the purchase of necessary materials as well as maintainence for her machines. Support this young woman so that she can work independently for a better future.

Translated from Spanish by Donald Allen, Kiva Volunteer.

Diana es una joven de 24 años con muchos deseos de superación, día a día está dedicada a trabajar en un establecimiento comercial que posee con su familia, se trata de una bodega donde ella ofrece el servicio de mecanografiado y fotocopiado, servicios que son muy solicitados en su localidad. La meta de Diana es crecer junto con su familia con este proyecto, abrir sucursales en otras zonas, esta mentalidad de superación es la lleva a mejorar cada día en su establecimiento, y con sólo un año de haber iniciado, ya se pueden ver los frutos. En esta ocasión Diana solicita un préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo e impulsar su negocio con la compra de los materiales necesarios y el mantenimiento de sus máquinas. Apoya a esta joven que trabaja de manera independiente por un futuro mejor.

loans.use: Purchase of necessary materials and maintainence for the machines in  her business of typing and photocopying.

loans.name: Vida

texts.en:
Vida is 34 years old and the mother of two children. The two of them are in school now. She has been selling grocery products for seven years in the market to support her family. She says her business is doing well and she therefore wants to use the loan to buy more products to increase her inventory.

Vida believes this loan will help her increase her savings towards the welfare of her two children who are in school now. She is a member of the group called “Ebe ba mu” (it shall come to pass). Members agree in unison to guarantee for each other to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy more grocery products like tinned fish, tinned tomatoes, cocoa products, skimmed milk, body pomade, etc.

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
Eduarda is a hard-working woman, whose efforts have been focused on raising animals. Currently, she is has pigs, which she raises in order to later sell to earn income. Eduarda has been working in agricultural activities since she was a girl, since she comes from a farming family that sells products from its harvests such as corn.

Eduarda takes care of her grandson for whom she works day to day. Eduarda wants to strengthen the business that she has recently started, the selling of dairy products, for which she travels to the capital city. She managed to care for and provide for her three children and now she wants to do the same for her grandson. Eduarda is requesting a loan to use for the purchase of more pigs.

Translated from Spanish by Donald Allen, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Eduarda es una mujer esforzada, cuyo trabajo han estado enfocado en la crianza de animales, actualmente tiene cerdos, que cría para luego venderlos y de esa manera obtener ganancias, Eduarda se dedica a las actividades agrícolas desde su niñez, ya que ella proviene de una familia netamente agricultora, vende los productos de su cosecha tales como el maíz.

Ella tiene a su cuidado a su nieto, por que trabaja día a día. Eduarda quiere fortalecer el negocio que ha iniciado recientemente, que es la venta de productos lácteos, viaja a la ciudad capital para ello. Ella supo cuidar y sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, ahora quiere hacer lo mismo por su nietecito. Doña Eduarda solicita un préstamo para la compra de más cerdos.

loans.use: Purchase of more pigs to raise and eventually sell

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina, a 36-year-old entrepreneur, is wife and mother of two children who are currently in school. She sells tomatoes, yams, onions, beans, maize, dried fish etc. on a table in the local market. Sakina says that, through this business, she has managed to send her first child all the way through senior high school. She is requesting this loan to enable her to buy more yams, baskets of tomatoes, onions, bags of maize, and beans to grow her business. She hopes to increase her savings to support the children as they attend school, to give them a future and hope.

Sakina belongs to the community group called “Ebe ba mu Trust Group”. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral and assist one another to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy more yams, baskets of tomatoes, onions, bags of maize, and beans

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is 30 years old and a married mother with three children. All her children are currently in school. She treks to the farming communities to purchase her products and retails them in the town market. She says the price of commodities is on the rise and she therefore wants to use the loan to buy more yams and rice to avoid price hikes and frequent travel. She hopes to increase her savings to help her husband pay the children’s school fees.

Comfort is a member of the group called “Ebe ba mu Trust Group” (It shall come to pass). Members agree to guarantee for one other as social collateral and assist each other to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy fresh yams and bags of rice

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, 28, is married with two kids in school. She has been selling grocery products like rice, fresh tomatoes, tinned tomatoes, cocoa products, skimmed milk, body pomade, etc. in the market of Koforidua, Ghana, for five years. Her experience in business has made her one of the most successful entrepreneurs in the market.

Elizabeth considers this loan a great opportunity to expand her business to include other items frequently demanded by customers. She wants to use the loan to buy cartons of milk, bags of sugar, cartons of vegetables, and palm oil to increase her stock of goods available for sale.

Elizabeth belongs to the community group called “Ebe ba mu Trust Group” (It shall come to pass). In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral to access the loan and assist each other to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy cartons of milk, bags of sugar, cartons of vegetables, and palm oil

loans.name: Ayishetu

texts.en:
Ayishetu sells vegetables and spices such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, garden eggs (egg-shaped eggplant ), etc. in the local market of Koforidua, Ghana. Ayishetu, 36, is married with four children who are enrolled in school. Ayishetu does not really have adequate working capital to support her business. She mostly buys supplies on credit and makes payments after sales. She wants to use the loan to buy more stocks of vegetables and spices to increase her inventory. She hopes to use part of her proceeds to finance her children’s education.

Ayishetu belongs to the community group called “Ebe ba mu Trust Group”. In this group, members assist one another to provide support in handling the repayment.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of vegetables and spices

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela is a woman that enjoys her work; she is in the animal breeding business. Thanks to this business she can cover her family’s expenses and the educational expenses for her four children. Graciela wishes to increase the number of animals she has in order to improve breeding. She not only sells these animals for meat but she also sells the wool to obtain additional income for her family. With this end in mind, she wishes to obtain breeding rams to improve the quality of her breeds. However, these animals are costly which is why she is asking for this loan. The sum that she needs is $600.00 which she guarantees will be properly invested. She is hoping for your support. Helping this woman achieve prosperity is in your hands.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy M., Kiva Volunteer.

Graciela es una mujer que le agrada la actividad que realiza, se dedica a la crianza de animales, gracias a ello, puede solventar los gastos de su familia y de sus 4 hijos quienes cursan estudios básicos.Graciela desea incrementar la cantidad de animales y mejorar la raza para. Ella no sólo los vende por su carne, sino también por la lana para obtener un ingreso adicional para su familia.Con este fin, desea obtener unos carneros de raza para mejorar la calidad, pero el precio de estos animales es costoso, por lo cual solicita el presente préstamo para la compra de estos animales, el monto que requiere es de 1700 soles, dinero que le garantiza, será debidamente invertido. Ella estará esperando por su apoyo, en sus manos está ayudar a la prosperidad de esta mujer.

loans.use: Purchase of breeding rams to improve the quality of her livestock.

loans.name: Hilma

texts.es:
Hilma, because of her great love for her daughter, works in various places which forces her to frequently leave her fields and livestock to the care of her parents who help her with this task. Hilma’s father is shown in the picture presented. He tells us that he and his wife do not think twice about helping their daughter while she is away at work because they see the daily effort that she makes in taking care of them and their small granddaughter. Hilma’s wish is to increase her livestock so that she can obtain greater profits so that she will no longer have to leave her home and her daughter to take on the jobs that are necessary to support her family. Hilma comes before you with the hope that you will be able to loan her the money that she needs to purchase livestock and farming supplies so that she will be able to remain with her family.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy M., Kiva Volunteer.

Hilma, por su gran amor a su hija, trabaja en diversos lugares, obligada en algunos casos a dejar sus terrenos de cultivo y a sus animales al cuidado de sus padres, quienes le ayudan en esta tarea. En la foto que presentamos, se encuentra el padre de Hilma, que nos cuenta que él y su esposa no dudan en apoyar a su hija mientras ella se encuentra fuera trabajando, porque ven a diario, el esfuerzo que hace para cuidar de ellos y de su pequeña nieta.El deseo de Hilma, es aumentar la cantidad de ganado, para que este le provea de mayores ganancias y ya no tenga que dejar su hogar y su hija por otros oficios que complementen el dinero necesario para su casa.Hilma se presenta aquí con la esperanza de que le puedan prestar el dinero que necesita para la compra de estos animales e insumos para sus terrenos de cultivo, y así pueda permanecer junto a su familia.

loans.use: Purchase of animals for livestock and farming supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana, due to her efforts and hard work was able to establish a store in her home. This is convenient for her since it allows her to watch her daughters.
